property.name: mapred.cache.archives
property.description: Add comma-separated entries for each archive you want to distribute. Each entry consists of two fields separated by '#': the first one is the HDFS path of the archive, either absolute or relative to your HDFS home dir; the second one is the name of the symlink to the local directory where the contents of the archive will be unpacked by Hadoop (you MUST set the mapred.create.symlink property to 'yes' for this to work).
